ecommerce.solution: Future Marketing AI automated the entire content process with 24/7 AI agents. Automatic trend research, multi-platform content generation, smart scheduling, and real-time performance tracking. All integrated with their webshop and product catalog.
ecommerce.results: From 40 to 160 posts/month (4x), 80 hours/month saved, engagement up 285%, and conversion rate improved 42%. Team can now focus on strategy and customer experience.

testimonial.quote: We spent 60+ hours/week on content. Now everything runs automatically and our engagement is 3x higher. Incredible how much time and money we save.

saas.pain_point: B2B content marketing was completely ad-hoc. No trend tracking, poor hashtag strategy, zero ROI on ads. Managing 5 freelancers without measurable results. Missing 80% of relevant industry trends.
saas.solution: Research Hub with 24/7 Perplexity AI trend forecasting, automatic competitor analysis, data-driven content planning, and ad pre-testing system. All content optimized for B2B LinkedIn and industry-specific platforms.
saas.results: Ad ROI increased from break-even to +340%. 3x more qualified leads per month. Team scaled from 2 to 8 channels without hiring. Pre-testing prevents wasted ad budget. Systematic approach generates consistent results.

testimonial.quote: From break-even to +340% ROI. We now pre-test every ad before spending budget. The system pays itself back 6x.
testimonial.author: Mark de Vries

retail.pain_point: 7 brands on 5 platforms—total chaos. Team of 8 constantly overworked. 40% of planned posts missed due to capacity issues. No central overview, inconsistent branding, missed engagement opportunities.
retail.solution: Command Center dashboard for all brands. Automatic content generation with brand guidelines per brand, smart scheduling for optimal times, 99.8% reliable publishing engine, and unified analytics dashboard.
retail.results: From 40% missed posts to 99.8% consistency. Team reduced from 8 to 3 people for monitoring. Managing 7 brands with 3-person team. Overall engagement increased 215% through better timing and higher frequency.

testimonial.quote: 7 brands, 1 dashboard. From chaos to 99.8% consistency. Our team went from 8 to 3 people. Game changer.
